mapper.select: SELECT A.COMP_CD, B.COMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IN_DT, A.INVOICE_NO, A.RCV_NO FROM TB_RCV_INFO A, TB_PARTNER_INFO B WHERE INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo} AND A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.ITEM_NAME, B.BOX_QTY, A.IN_QTY, A.IN_PRICE / A.IN_QTY AS UNIT_PRICE, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'IT05' AND B.LOCATION = COM_CD) LOCATION, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'IT03' AND B.BOX_TYPE=COM_CD)AS BOX_TYPE FROM TB_RCV_ITEM A, TB_ITEM_INFO B, TB_RCV_INFO C WHERE A.RCV_NO = C.RCV_NO AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND C.INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo}
SELECT REPLACE('RCV'||TO_CHAR (SUBSTR(MAX(RCV_NO), 5, 2)+1, '000'), ' ', '') RCV_NO FROM TB_RCV_INFO WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RCV_INFO(RCV_NO, INVOICE_NO, COMP_CD, IN_DT, IN_STATUS, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID) VALUES (#{rcvNo}, #{invoiceNo}, #{compCd}, #{inDt}, '입고중', SYSDATE, #{regUserId})

update.foreach: INTO TB_RCV_ITEM ( RCV_NO, ITEM_CD, IN_QTY, IN_PRICE, LOCATION, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{rcvNo}, #{item.itemCd}, #{item.inQty}, #{item.inQty} * #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.location}, SYSDATE, #{regUserId} )
